mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorial of 100 years a republic: Declaration of Independence
Memorial of one hundred years a republic
United States. Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
Berry, T. J.
Loag, Samuel.
United States.
United States. Continental Congress.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 62 x 47 cm. on sheet 71 x 54 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lithograph; text is in the shape of the Liberty Bell, with some phrases highlighted in bold; without the signatures. The title, on a banner held by an eagle, is flanked by views of Independence Hall and Carpenter's Hall. A "Bird's-eye view of exhibition grounds" centered at the bottom of the sheet is flanked to two soldiers, signed C.H. The elaborate design also features a display of flags, a medallion portrait of Washington, and the seals of all the states.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Mounted on linen; stamped Library of Congress; Duplicate. Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Centennial Exhibition (1876 : Philadelphia, Pa.)
Liberty Bell
